project.name: Hero: Project Zomboid Build 42: When Modders Meet Multiplayer

data.label: Style
data.name: w33s3 Dark + Retro
data.description: Dark, moody atmosphere with high contrast lighting. Cinematic composition with neon pink and cyan accents against deep blacks. Retro gaming aesthetic, CRT glow effects, pixel art influence. Professional photography feel, dramatic shadows.

data.label: Setting
data.description: Dark room with retro gaming setup, CRT monitors glowing, arcade machines in background, warm ambient lighting from screens

data.label: Action
data.content: Abandoned suburban safehouse at night with forge glowing orange through boarded windows, zombie silhouettes in fog beyond the fence, multiple survivors working together - one at a crafting bench, one keeping watch with a rifle. Industrial survival compound aesthetic with drying racks and chicken coops visible. Dark, moody atmosphere with hints of community resilience against the apocalypse.

data.label: Negative
data.content: blurry, low quality, text, watermark, signature, logo, oversaturated, amateur, stock photo, realistic human faces
